Author: lcayerf
Text: So I had my gall bladder removed at 21 after having about 3 years of gallstones attacks (yeah I should've got it removed sooner but I hate hospitals.) My problems arose from a lot of binge eating in my teens and then a year of heavy restricting made it a hell of a lot worse. Yo-yo dieting and quick weight loss can really cause havoc for your gall bladder. So yes, it's one of the key things that can cause issues arising. If you think you might have issues, I would definitely try and see a doctor, as even tho we don't need really need a gall bladder, it can lead to more serious things like pancreatitis which is v dangerous & it's not worth it. Let me know if you need more information ðŸ’–
